Method Detail

createRefund

public Refund createRefund(Account account,
                           UUID paymentId,
                           @Nullable
                           BigDecimal specifiedRefundAmount,
                           boolean isAdjusted,
                           Map<UUID,BigDecimal> invoiceItemIdsWithAmounts,
                           InternalCallContext context)
                    throws PaymentApiException
Create a refund and adjust the invoice or invoice items as necessary.

Parameters:
account - account to refund
paymentId - payment associated with that refund
specifiedRefundAmount - amount to refund. If null, the amount will be the sum of adjusted invoice items
isAdjusted - whether the refund should trigger an invoice or invoice item adjustment
invoiceItemIdsWithAmounts - invoice item ids and associated amounts to adjust
context - the call context
Returns:
the created context
Throws:
PaymentApiException

                 throws PaymentApiException
